text: sillo hananimkkeseo naelisin seongseoleul gamchugo geugeos-eulo hachanh-eun iig-eul chaeng-gineun jadeul, jeodeul-i baes sog-eulo samkineun geos-eun ojig hwayeom-il ppun-ila. ttohan hananimkkeseoneun buhwal-ui nal geudeul-ege malsseum-eul geoljido, geudeul-eul jeonghwahajido anh-eusil geos-imyeo geudeul-egeneun gotongseuleon beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
